Class War

java.lang.Object
  CardGame
      War

public class War
extends CardGame

Public Class War sets up a war card game with two players and a standard deck of 52 playing cards

Version:
4/20/2015
Author:
Brendan Powell

          method draws two players cards and duals them, returns 1 if player 1 wins or 2 of player 2 wins method also puts all of the battle cards into the winning players deck, but in the back of that deck this method uses ****RECURSION****

battle

public int battle()
           throws EmptyDeckException
method draws two players cards and duals them, returns 1 if player 1 wins or 2 of player 2 wins method also puts all of the battle cards into the winning players deck, but in the back of that deck this method uses ****RECURSION****

int winner

EmptyDeckException

play

public void play()
play should continuously call battle until one of the players has no cards left. when one player owns the entire deck or the other player cant produce the cards to continue playing the player with the most cards wins
